trends: There have been 76 other sightings in Calgary
There were no other sightings in Calgary on or around September 16th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was siting down outside on my backyard deck looking at the stars with my binoculars for a while just doing my usual astronomy thing and wanted to give my eyes a break and have a sip of my water. when all of a sudden i felt compelled to look up.i saw a really bright large orb or something flying across the sky,i tracked it with my binoculars and could completely tell that it was no air craft that i know of.there was no sound of an engine nothing at all,and there was no aircraft in the sky at the time.it was also being followed by a star like object,it was kind of funny because it reminded me of close encounters the movie,the orb i saw was at least 1000 to 2000 feet in altitude and i would say about 35 to 50 feet in diameter traveling maybe 80 to 100 km\h.i was facing north and the objects were traveling from the west to the east over top of me.i will never forget this encounter ever!!!,it was the most crazy thing i have ever seen.
Summary: Super bright orb followed by a small star like object.
